Name: Game Setup
Description: Set up the basic structure of the game including the game board and player data and the initial game state.

Name: Player Turns
Description: Implement the logic for players to take their turns alternating between X and O.

Name: Win Detection
Description: Create the logic to detect a winning move or a draw.

Name: User Interface
Description: Design and implement the user interface for the game including the game board and feedback to the players.
